name: sherpa
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a thick, soft artificial material used for making clothes that looks similar to sheepskin (= the skin of a sheep with wool on one side): This cosy zip hoodie is fully lined with sherpa. He wore ripped jeans with a sherpa jacket.
Elsa Borg /EyeEm/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesSherpa is lighter weight than real sheep's wool, much less bulky, and faster drying.This is a cool sherpa jacket that's perfect for spring weather.The timeless denim jacket features a sherpa lining and collar.
